data.message: how can i get verified  tick mark on my profile ? Is it service for all or any specific  person  or area?

replies.message:
Hi Lilz. Thank you for your questions. You can learn more about the process for requesting a blue verification badge here: http://bit.ly/2y6Inst. 
We apply the blue verification badge to eligible brands, media organizations and public figures. Eligibility for the blue verification badge is based on a variety of factors, such as account completeness, policy compliance and public interest. -Anna
